**Context:**
>@0xstatic is spoiling us with another challenge.
>Here's a flag for you. Can you flag the flag?

```txt

```

## Step 1 - Decode Base64 and notice PNG

![image](1.png)

## Step 2 - Convert to an Image how you see fit.

```bash
echo "<insert base64>" | base64 -d > file.png
```

*(Replace `<insert base64>` with the provided base64 string.)*
Cyberchef will let you convert it.

![image](2.png)
